sqlMap.select: SELECT a.* , b.id AS link_id , b.link_name , b.link_mobilephone, c.name AS branch_name, d.para_name AS car_type_name, e.para_name AS car_nature_name FROM T_Cm_Car a LEFT JOIN dbo.T_Cm_Link b ON a.car_link = b.id LEFT JOIN dbo.T_Cm_Branch c ON a.branch_id = c.id LEFT JOIN dbo.T_Cm_Code d ON d.para_value=a.car_type AND d.para_type='car_type' LEFT JOIN dbo.T_Cm_Code e ON e.para_value=a.car_type AND e.para_type='car_nature' where $and{a.id = #id#} $and{car_area_id = #car_area_id#} $and{b.link_name like '%$link_name$%'} $and{car_no like '%$car_no$%'} $and{insurance_number = #insurance_number#} $and{car_produce_no = #car_produce_no#} $and{car_type = #car_type#} $and{car_nature = #car_nature#} $and{car_engine_number = #car_engine_number#} $and{car_drive_no = #car_drive_no#} $and{car_owner = #car_owner#} $and{car_link = #car_link#} $and{car_memo like '%$car_memo$%'} $and{branch_id = #branch_id#}
sqlMap.update: update T_Cm_Car set id=#id# ,car_area_id=#car_area_id# ,car_no=#car_no# ,insurance_number=#insurance_number# ,car_produce_no=#car_produce_no# ,car_type=#car_type# ,car_nature=#car_nature# ,car_engine_number=#car_engine_number# ,car_drive_no=#car_drive_no# ,car_owner=#car_owner# ,car_link=#car_link# ,car_memo=#car_memo# ,branch_id=#branch_id# WHERE id = #id#
sqlMap.delete: delete FROM T_Cm_Car WHERE id IN(#ids#)
